name: MyCypher
overview:
MyCypher is a dynamic mobile social platform that allows artists worldwide to create new music in real-time by turning every mobile phone into a microphone.

Using VOIP mobile technology and our custom platform, MyCypher.com provides artists with a â€œVirtual Cypherâ€ where they can showcase their songs in near real-time from anywhere in the world â€“ via our Global Open Mic (think ‘Audio Twitter’ for Music) via any online computer, standard cell phone, or smartphone (iPhone & Android).

The platform has both a web-based recording component and a simultaneous mobile recording component. By either singing / rapping into a computer microphone or by calling a toll-free phone number for their country, artists can instantly post new tracks to their profile from any phone or web-enabled computer.
